question: Which country will host the 2022 Winter Olympic Games?
explanation: China will host the 2022 Winter Olympic Games. The 2022 Winter Olympics, officially known as the XXIV Olympic Winter Games and commonly known as Beijing 2022, are an international winter multi-sport event scheduled to take place from 4 to 20 February 2022, mainly in Beijing, China. Beijing was elected as the host city at the 128th IOC Session in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia in July 2015. These Games will be the first Winter Olympics to be held in China.
